Header: Foreign diplomats visits Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy
Content: Several diplomats of foreign countries who have come to attend the National Day celebrations have visited the historic Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy. Ambassadors, High commissioners and their representatives of 23 countries including Romania, Salvador, Ethiopia, Kazhakasthan and Maldives visited the Sri Dalada Maligawa. They also viewed the World Buddhist museum at the Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy.
